info.narration: [{$0 shows off a brilliant posture, beautiful enough to enchant anyone.}]
[{Only chosen Knights can enter the Palace of the Moon.}]
[{$0 searches for her Knight in shining armor.}]

collection.name: White Lake
collection.openText: Only chosen Knights can enter the Palace of the Moon.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When work was committed by employee Onorino who had less than 2 Fortitude, the work success rate was hugely increased. If said work results in Good, $0 gave the employee its E.G.O Gift.
When work was committed by an employee with more than 3 Fortitude, the work success rate decreased. If said employee attempted Attachment work, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.

When $0's Qliphoth Counter reached 0, employee Onorino - who had recieved its E.G.O. gift - turned into a "knight". Those turned into a knight can be normalized via restoring their SP with WHITE or BLACK damage, similar to a panicking employee. When the "knight" is either suppressed or killed, White Lake's Qliphoth Counter returned to max. If no employee has White Lake's E.G.O. Gift, the employee who entered the Containment Cell became a "knight".
